pages.text: $(l)/help$() shows a list of all commands$(br2)$(l)/help <command>$() shows usages of selected command  $(br2)$(l)/clear$() clears all items in the inventory$(br2)$(l)/gamemode$() changes your gamemode $(br2)$(l)/gamerule$() sets a gamerule $(br2)$(l)/xp$() add or remove xp  $(br2)$(l)/kill$() kills entities  $(br2)$(l)/locate$() Locates the closest structure, biome or point of interest

$(l)/setblock$() changes a block to another  $(br2)$(l)/fill$() fill a region with a specific block  $(br2)$(l)/summon$() spawns a entity $(br2)$(l)/time$() changes the world time $(br2)$(l)/tp$() teleports  $(br2)$(l)/ban$() ban player from a server  $(br2)$(l)/spawnpoint$() set the player's spawnpoint  $(br2)$(l)/setworldspawn$() sets the world spawn  $(br2)$(l)/weather$() controls the weather
A list of all commands and it's detailed description can be found in the $(l:https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Commands)Minecraft Wiki$().
